name: One day trip in equator city - Pontianak
description:
Welcome to Pontianak. The capital city of West Borneo. Pontianak is located almost precisely on the equator, hence it is widely known as Kota Khatulistiwa (Equator City).
Pontianak is widely known for its culinary. Also from the culture, because there's three major ethnicity live here together in harmony, Dayak, Chinese, and Malay.
With this one day trip. You'll enjoy a cultural and gastronomic experience.
